New Records: The Cardinals have yet to win a game at the current Yankee Stadium, extending their record to 0-4.
Key Match Events: Cardinals reliever Riley O'Brien gave up a two-run home run to NY catcher Austin Wells in the bottom of the eighth inning, making it a 6-3 game.
Post-Match Reflections: The loss hurt the Cardinals' playoff chances and extended their losing streak at Yankee Stadium.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Cardinals' last victory at Yankees Stadium was in Game 5 of the 1964 World Series, led by Hall of Fame pitcher Bob Gibson.
